UI_AntidoteSaviour: 只有携带解毒剂的玩家才能救你！
UI_DrinkBlood: 周围没有无辜者时悄悄饮用血袋
UI_FindFuse: 在恐魔暴怒前找出所有保险丝以前往下一区域
UI_FindFuseEscape: 寻找保险丝以打开逃生口
UI_FindFuseTrap: 恐魔暴怒了！被困住前尽快找出所有保险丝
UI_FindWayToNextBuilding: 找到前往下一处建筑的路
UI_GiveFreeRep: 选择某位玩家免费赠予声誉值：
UI_NoTraitsCollected: 未能从交易铺中获得技能
UI_NoTraitsT1: 你尚未在其他角色上解锁任何第一层技能
UI_NoTraitsT2: 你尚未在其他角色上解锁任何第二层技能
UI_PreventDrinkBlood: 盯住血袋以防止感染者饮用
UI_PreventFuseFinding: 阻挠无辜者找全保险丝
UI_QC5_3: 寻找保险丝并放置到保险丝盒。
UI_QC5_4: 拿取道具并留神是否有人喝血。
UI_SelectVent: 选择通风口做为你的出口！
UI_SetLangDutch: Start uw spel opnieuw op om de nieuwe taal in te stellen. Sommige vertalingen zijn gedaan door vrijwilligers en zijn dus misschien niet helemaal correct. Laat graag een game-ontwikkelaar weten via Discord, Steam forums of via sociale media als er iets gecorrigeerd moet worden.
UI_TerrorAbility1Description: 放出一个你的克隆体向前笔直奔跑5秒，如果受到伤害则会提前消失
UI_TerrorAbility2Description: 重置你的光照值并对伤害免疫，但同时会降低2秒移动速度
UI_TerrorAbility3Description: 吼叫会让你周围的人类角色困惑2秒
UI_TerrorAbility4Description: 立即化身一群蝙蝠并进入通风口
UI_TipAmmoDescription: 如果你没弹药了，可以在地图上搜索。
UI_TipAntidoteDescription: 用来救起一位刚被处决的玩家。
UI_TipBloodDescription: 喝血袋来积攒恐魔血值，攒满一条即可在晚上变身
UI_TipCameraDescription: 用来在熄灯后照瞎恐魔。
UI_TipDeactivateDescription: 破坏操纵杆能够取消激活的道具。
UI_TipDoubleObjDescription: 一个人踩住踏板，另一位拿取道具。
UI_TipEnrageDescription: 你已经进入狂暴状态！立刻变身来使用你无尽的血条。
UI_TipEnrageInnocentEscapeDescription: 恐魔已处于狂暴状态！这是你在他们找到并杀死你之前，最后逃跑的机会。
UI_TipEnrageInnocentFusesDescription: 恐魔已处于狂暴状态！这是你在他们赢得游戏之前，最后收集保险丝的机会。
UI_TipEscapeInfectedDescription: 出口已经开放，不要让无辜者们逃出去！
UI_TipFusesDescription: 熄灯时收集全保险丝后解锁下一区域。
UI_TipGasDescription: 在你被毒气毒死前，跟着信标走进下一区域。
UI_TipHalfBloodDescription: 熄灯时血袋只会提供半条恐魔血条的血量。
UI_TipHealthDescription: 如果你生命值过低，找一个医疗包。
UI_TipInspectionKitDescription: 用来检测某人是感染者还是无辜者。
UI_TipLethalInjectionDescription: 用来立即除去一位玩家。
UI_TipLeversDescription: 拉下操作杆激活道具可以拿取地图各处的道具。
UI_TipShootObjDescription: 按照高亮的顺序射击靶子，射中最后一靶的人将获取道具。
UI_TipTrackedDescription: 你被某位实验对象跟踪了。
UI_TipTrackerDescription: 用来跟踪一名玩家的位置。
UI_TipTransformDescription: 在熄灯时，你能够变身成恐魔形态。
UI_TipTrapDescription: 放置后能放倒接近它的恐魔。
UI_TipVotingDescription: 当你倒下后至复活或获救前的这段时间里，其他玩家可以通过投票来把你除去。
UI_VoteDeathMessage0: 实验对象将你投票出局
UI_WaitForBlackout: 等待下次熄灯后发动袭击！
ui_1InnocentsAlive: 另外1名无辜者成功逃脱
ui_2InnocentsAlive: 另外2名无辜者成功逃脱
ui_3InnocentsAlive: 另外3名无辜者成功逃脱
ui_4InnocentsAlive: 另外4名无辜者成功逃脱
ui_ActivateOtherLevers: 请先激活此区域中的其他操纵杆
ui_AntidoteDesc: 让最近被处决的人复活
ui_BloodBagFull: 你的恐魔血条已经全满了
ui_BonusMarkEscape: 团体逃脱 — 奖励标志！
ui_BonusMarkSurvive: 小组幸存 — 奖励标志！
ui_ChatUnavailableCCTV: 在监控电视中无法交谈
ui_FuseBoxesLeftToFill: 其他需填充的保险丝盒：
ui_InspectionKitDesc: 检测某人是否为感染者
ui_LastEscaped: 最后一名无辜者已逃脱！
ui_LastKilled: 最后一名无辜者被杀害！

ui_SetLangBrazilian: Por favor, reinicie o seu jogo para usar o novo idioma. Algumas das traduções são voluntárias e poderão não estar corretas.
ui_SetLangChinese: 设置新语言后请重启游戏。部分翻译由志愿者完成，可能会有所偏差。如果发现需要改正的译误，请告知开发组成员（通过Discord、论坛或社交媒体）。
ui_SetLangEnglish: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate.
ui_SetLangFrench: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangGerman: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangHungarian: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangItalian: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangJapanese: 言語の変更を適用するためにゲームを再起動してください。このゲームの翻訳はボランティアによって作られています。そのため間違った翻訳や不適切な表現が含まれている可能性があります。もしそのような翻訳を見つけた場合はDiscordやフォーラム、SNSなどでお知らせください。
ui_SetLangKorean: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangPolish: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
ui_SetLangPortuguese: Por favor, reinicia o jogo para usares o novo idioma. Algumas das traduções são voluntárias e poderão não estar corretas.
ui_SetLangRussian: Пожалуйста, перезагрузите игру для выбора нового языка. Наши волонтеры занимаются переводом, но в некоторых случаях, он может быть не точным. Просим вас сообщать разработчикам (через Discord, форумы, социальные сети) обо всех корректировках, которые необходимо внести.
ui_SetLangSpanish: Por favor, reinicia el juego para cambiar el idioma. Algunas de nuestras traducciones son voluntarias y debido a ello pueden no ser del todo correctas. Si hay alguna corrección que debería hacerse por favor deja un comentario a algún desarrollador en Discord, foros o redes sociales
ui_SetLangThai: รีสตาร์ทเกมเพื่อเปลี่ยนภาษา อาจมีการแปลผิดพลาดเนื่องจากแปลโดยอาสาสมัครคนไทย หากพบข้อผิดพลาดสามารถแจ้งทีมงานได้ที่ Discord, Forums และ Social Media
ui_SetLangTurkish: Please restart your game to set your new language. Some of our translations are voluntary and as such may not be accurate. Please let a developer know (on Discord, forums, social media) if there is a correction that should be made
